name: Farm FIX Simulator 2014
description:
Now you can find out how does the mechanic’s work look like on the farm:
- Repair the tractor and its components
- Improve the equipment and tools
- Choose interesting orders
- Replace or repair damaged parts
- Plan the purchase of spare parts
- Perform special tasks and receive awards

In the game you will find:
- Almost 50 different parts
- More than 50 types of faults to be removed
- Unlimited number of orders to perform
- Unlimited number of special tasks

The game is available to everyone for free!
